documentation.summary: This document provides method-level documentation for the LINQ_Assignment project. The project consists of three core functionalities: - Retrieving even numbers from an array. - Shuffling an array and returning odd numbers. - Computing statistical metrics (average, min, max) for an array.

class.name: GetEven
class.summary: Provides functionality to retrieve even numbers from an integer array using LINQ.

method.name: GetEvenNumbers
method.summary: Returns all even numbers from an array with an option to skip items.
method.param: An integer array representing the dataset.
An optional parameter that skips a specified number of even numbers.
method.returns: A collection of even numbers from the input array.
